name: Drag Bikes
description:
Experience the thrill of formula drift in our latest motorsport Drag racing game! Drag Bikes - Free Racing game will test your skill to the limit. How far can you perform wheelie with your motorcycle? Can you impress everyone as you rampage through the race track? Play our motorsport game and find out!
HOW TO PLAY:Hold Clutch and Tap Gas button. Then Release Clutch and Send your moped to finish line!
You need very good reactions to win!!
========================================================
FEATURES OF DRAG BIKES
========================================================
Realistic and immersive game graphic & sound.
Get coins to unlock more motorbikes and parts.
Try your hand at riding low cc scooters and turbo motorbikes
Upgrade your motorbikes and customize them
Perform awesome motorcycle wheelies on your bikes.
Intuitive and response game control.
See how you perform compared to other players on Online Leaderboards.
Manual & automatic Gears. (unlock Manual mode & shift gears yourself)

500 career levels.
Free game.
Our Motorsport game is very addictive and realistic. If you want to experience extreme motorcycle racing game, this is the game that you should try. Riding a motorbike is definitely more challenging than even the most extreme car driving simulator. That’s because you have to control everything at once: your direction, the speed, and how you throttle. To succeed as drift racer, you must give your 110% attention
If you are a gamer who doesn’t back down from a challenge, then this game is perfect for you! The Online Leaderboard will show who’s the best player among the best from around the world. So, if you are ready to take on this challenge, download our formula drift racing game now!
---

Please help us improve our games! Leave us your rating and review.
